document.heading: Public School Enrollment Integrity Temporary Amendment Act of 2001

history.narrative: Law 14-38, the “Public School Enrollment Integrity Temporary Amendment Act of 2001”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-242, which was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 5, 2001, and June 26, 2001, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 12, 2001, it was assigned Act No. 14-100 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-38 became effective on October 13, 2001.
